title: Shadowflame Hex Doll
summaries: The Shadowflame Hex Doll is a Hardmode magic weapon that fires curving purple tentacle projectiles at decent range, which inflict the Shadowflame debuff with the same purple flame effects. Using it a single time will fire 3 projectiles at once, but the weapon can be quickly used to make up to 9 projectiles at once. It has a 16.67*1/6 (16.67%) / 33.33*1/3 (33.33%) chance to drop from Goblin Warlock during a Hardmode Goblin Invasion.

statistics.Damage: 32 / 40 (Magic)
statistics.Tooltip: Summons Shadowflame tentacles to strike your foes
statistics.Sell: 2
